trans-unit.source: Provides collection support for a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> 物件集合的集合支援。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator of type <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> 型別的列舉程式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements that the new collection is initially capable of storing.
trans-unit.target: 新集合初始可儲存的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection" /> instance that is empty and has the specified initial capacity.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體是空白且可具有指定的初始容量。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至集合的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> 加入集合結尾。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect> objects derive from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>, they are copied when they are used.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect>物件衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>，使用時，將它們複製。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, later, you might not be able to retrieve or remove the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect> you added to the collection using the original <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect> object.
trans-unit.target: 因此，更新版本中，您可能會無法擷取或移除<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect>您加入至集合以原始<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect> in the collection is a copy of the original <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect> and is considered a different <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect> than the one you added.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect>集合中是原始檔案的副本<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect>會被視為不同<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect>比您所加入。

trans-unit.source: Removes all elements from the list.
trans-unit.target: 將所有項目從清單中移除。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> to locate in the collection
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中尋找的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the specified item is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的項目是否在集合中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the collection contains <paramref name="value" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合包含 <paramref name="value" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The array into which the collection's items are to be copied.
trans-unit.target: 集合的項目將複製到其中的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The index of <c>array</c> at which to start copying the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <c>array</c> 的索引，要從這裡開始複製 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection" /> 的內容。

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection" /> to a one-dimensional array of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" />, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 從目標陣列的指定索引開始，複製整個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection" /> 至型別 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> 的一維陣列。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of elements in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合中的項目數。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的項目數。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可逐一查看這個集合的列舉程式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that can iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />，可以逐一查看集合。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators only allow reading the data in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值只允許讀取集合中的資料。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值無法用於修改基礎集合。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。

trans-unit.source: At this position, calling <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 在這個位置上，呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first item of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>將列舉值前進到再讀取的值集合的第一個項目<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 或 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the next item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 設定<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>下一個項目。

trans-unit.source: After the end of the collection is passed, the enumerator is positioned after the last item in the collection, and calling <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 集合的末端後，列舉程式會放置在集合中，最後一個項目之後和呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, calling <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果最後一個呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>傳回`false`，則呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the first item of the collection again, you can call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> followed by <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>集合一次的第一個項目，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>後面<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying or deleting items, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、 修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，而且下次呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>會擲回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: If the collection is modified between <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> and <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> will return the item that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 如果之間修改集合<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>和<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>，<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>會傳回設定為時，項目，即使列舉值已經無效。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使集合經過同步化，其他執行緒仍然可以修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中尋找的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the entire collection.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" />，並傳回整個集合中第一個符合的以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of <paramref name="value" /> within the entire collection, if found; otherwise, <c>-1</c>.
trans-unit.target: 如有找到，則為整個集合內 <paramref name="value" /> 的第一個符合項目之以零為起始的索引；否則為 <c>-1</c>。

trans-unit.source: The collection is searched forward starting at the first key frame and ending at the last key frame.
trans-unit.target: 向前復原開始的第一個主要畫面格，並在最後一個主要畫面格結束，則會搜尋集合。

trans-unit.source: This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrameCollection.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，平均執行時間是成比例<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrameCollection.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: That is, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrameCollection.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，這個方法是 O (*n*) 作業，其中*n*是<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrameCollection.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method determines equality by calling <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會判斷是否相等，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which the value <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 應該插入值 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> 處之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> to insert into the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要插入至集合的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" />。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> into a specific location in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> 插入集合內的指定位置。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the collection from which to get or set the item.
trans-unit.target: 從中取得或設定項目之集合的以零起始索引，

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the item that is stored at the zero-based index of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定項目，這個項目儲存在集合中以零起始的索引處。

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 在指定索引上的項目。

trans-unit.source: This property provides the ability to access a specific item in the collection by using an index.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性提供了可使用索引來存取集合中的特定項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要從集合中移除的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中移除指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="value" /> was removed fro the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已從集合中移除 <paramref name="value" /> 則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The objects that follow the removed object are shifted to occupy the vacated position, and their index values are updated.
trans-unit.target: 請遵循移除的物件的物件移位，以佔用空出的位置，而且會更新其索引值。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the first null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) entry is removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是`null`參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)，則第一次為 null 參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 項目已移除。

trans-unit.source: Note that removing a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) entry is linear in the size of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 請注意移除 null 參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 項目中是線性集合的大小。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> 以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中移除指定索引處的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" />。

trans-unit.source: The objects that follow the removed object are shifted to occupy the vacated position, and their index values are updated.
trans-unit.target: 請遵循移除的物件的物件移位，以佔用空出的位置，而且會更新其索引值。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1.IsReadOnly" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1.IsReadOnly" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection" /> is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 是唯讀，則為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1.GetEnumerator" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1.GetEnumerator" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1" /> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1" /> 物件，可用於逐一查看集合。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that receives the copied items from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection" /> 接收複製項目的以零為起始的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The first position in the specified <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to receive the copied contents.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的第一個位置，將接收複製來的內容。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized" />.
